text: Asal yeh hai ke jo cheez inke ilm ki giraft mein nahin aayi aur jiska maâ€™al bhi inke samne nahin aaya(whose final sequel was not apparent to them), usko inhon ne (khwa ma khwa atkal picchu) jhutla diya. Isi tarah to insey pehle ke log bhi jhutla chuke hain. Phir dekhlo un zalimon ka kya anjaam hua
